short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your browser with artificial intelligence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Give BrowseGPT instructions like "Find a place to stay in Seattle on February 22nd" or "buy a children's book on Amazon", and it will use artificial intelligence to attempt to complete the task for you. BrowseGPT uses OpenAI's gpt-4o-mini model to process web pages and issue commands like CLICK, ENTER_TEXT or NAVIGATE.

Is it useful? Sort of... sometimes it will get stuck in a loop, click on the wrong thing, or navigate to a URL that 404s. It provides a reason for every decision it makes so you can help it correct course if necessary.

⚠️ This is an experimental extension and should be used with caution. Don't use this on pages with private information, or pages where taking the wrong action could cause a serious problem. ⚠️
